name: Genuine Parts Company
description: Genuine Parts Company (GPC) is a leading distributor of automotive and industrial replacement parts, tools, and supplies. Founded in 1928 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, GPC operates in the automotive, industrial, and electrical sectors, serving customers in North America, Europe, and Asia. The company is primarily known for its extensive network of NAPA (National Automotive Parts Association) stores that provide high-quality aftermarket automotive parts and accessories. With a commitment to customer service and product reliability, GPC has built a strong reputation among automotive repair shops and consumers alike. The company also operates in the industrial supply sector through its subsidiaries, which offer a range of products including bearings, power transmission products, and electrical components. GPC's strategy focuses on enhancing its distribution network, expanding its product offerings, and leveraging technology to improve operational efficiency. As a result, Genuine Parts Company has positioned itself well for future growth within the evolving landscape of the automotive and industrial markets, continually adapting to meet the needs of its diverse customer base.

faq.answer: Genuine Parts Company is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.answer: GPC's main product categories include automotive parts and industrial products.

faq.answer: Genuine Parts Company was founded in 1928.
